alert.note: Alert for Anchorage (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 22 at 12:32PM AKST until November 23 at 1:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Anchorage. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 1 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A wintry mix of snow, sleet, and freezing rain this afternoon will transition to light freezing rain this evening. Periods of light freezing rain are expected through Thursday morning before temperatures warm above freezing. Temperatures along the Anchorage Hillside will remain above freezing with only rain expected. Winds along the Anchorage Hillside will gust as high as 50 mph this evening before diminishing overnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
